gallery.title: Our Tiny Homes
gallery.subtitle: Enjoy small town living when you stay in our cozy tiny homes. We offer the tranquility of open spaces without sacrificing comfort. Walk or bike to local dining, markets, and attractions—the ancient Phimai Historical Park and the iconic Sai Ngam mangrove—all just minutes away.

location.title: Discover Phimai
location.description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and natural beauty of Phimai. Our tiny homes are perfectly positioned to explore the ancient Khmer temple complex, the iconic Sai Ngam banyan tree forest, and the charming local markets. Experience authentic Thai culture in this peaceful small town setting.
